text.summary: A speaker criticizes Jeff Bezos for flying to space for 2.5 million dollars per 60 seconds while paying little taxes, and plays back a conversation with David McIntosh of the Club for Growth, who argues billionaires can spend their money as they wish, in opposition to the speaker's view that low taxation means the public is subsidizing billionaires' space adventures.
